sentences.english: In recent years, medical research found that age-related hearing loss and iron deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 近年医学研究发现，老年性耳聋与缺铁有关。

sentences.english: The electro-audiogram shows that yours is a type of nerve deafness ( conduction deafness, mixed type deafness).
sentences.chinese: 也许神经性耳聋最常见的原因是青年性耳聋。

sentences.english: The electro-audiogram shows that yours is a type of nerve deafness ( conduction deafness, mixed type deafness).
sentences.chinese: 也许神经性耳聋最常见的原因是青年性耳聋。

sentences.english: She teaches deaf children to lip-read.
sentences.chinese: 她教耳聋儿童运用唇读法。

sentences.english: The doctor is highly competent, many patients recover their lost hearing after receiving treatment.
sentences.chinese: 这位医生妙手回春，不少耳聋的人经治疗复聪了。

sentences.english: Palumbo, are you crippled and deaf?
sentences.chinese: 普伦波，你残废了还是耳聋了？

sentences.english: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
sentences.chinese: 盲目的妻子和耳聋的丈夫才会缔结好姻缘。

sentences.english: Objective To search responsible nuclear genes for matrilineal non-syndromic deafness.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索与母系遗传性非综合征性耳聋相关的核基因。

sentences.english: The lab's research into the regeneration of hair cells for transplantation into the inner ear to cure deafness will also continue.
sentences.chinese: 这项治愈耳聋的内耳毛细胞再生移植研究将继续下去。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the relations between sensorineural deafness and flying in aviation or space.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨感觉神经性耳聋与航空航天飞行的关系。

sentences.english: The head injury deafened her for life.
Methods The ossicular reconstruction of 6 patients who suffered from middle conductive hearing loss were operated by the endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法用耳内镜为6例传导性耳聋患者重建听骨链。

sentences.english: Deafness refers to the complete loss of hearing ability in one or two ears.
sentences.chinese: 耳聋是指一只或两只耳朵的听力完全丧失。

sentences.english: There was a time in my life when I did not like who I was because of my deafness.
sentences.chinese: 有一段时间因为耳聋，我很讨厌自己。

sentences.english: A husband must be deaf and the wife blind to have quietness .
sentences.chinese: 丈夫耳聋，妻子眼瞎，方有安定之家。

definition: paralysis of one side of the body/hemiplegia
to lose one's eyesight/to become blind/blindness
